sentences.en: A burgh of northern Scotland on the Moray Firth at the terminus of the Caledonian Canal.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰北部一自治市,位于默里湾,是喀里多尼亚运河的终点.

sentences.en: Acid intrusions of Late Caledonian or Early Variscian Epoch result from island arc magmatism.
sentences.cn: 加里东晚期或华力西早期侵位的酸性侵入岩为岛弧环境产物.

sentences.en: Birds may not be renowned for their intelligence but New Caledonian crows have an instinctive ability to make and use tools, researchers said on Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 制造和利用工具是人类区别于其他动物的重要特征，然而最近英国的一项科学研究却发现，在这一点上人类其实并不孤单，新苏格兰乌鸦天生就具有一种制造和使用工具的能力。

sentences.en: From the Early Silurian large scale of retrogression had begun accompanying the Late Caledonian movement.
sentences.cn: 晚加里东运动(始于早志留世)发生了大规模的海退.

sentences.en: Gold source is from Caledonian and Hercynian granite.
sentences.cn: 该区金直接来源于加里东和华力西花岗岩.

sentences.en: Rock Hill Caledonian granite and marble ago 4 - 6 billion years.
sentences.cn: 山体岩石为加里东期花岗岩和大理石,距今4——6亿年.

sentences.en: The Complex rock mass consists of Caledonian granite , Indo - Sinian granite and early Yanshanian granite.
sentences.cn: 都庞岭复式岩体由加里东期 、 印支期和燕山早期花岗岩组成.

sentences.en: The deformation D 4 resulted from Caledonian movement.
sentences.cn: D_4期变形为后期加里东运动的产物.

sentences.en: The metallogenesis is close related with the Caledonian - Indosinian regional metamorphism.
sentences.cn: 加里东期~印支期区域变质作用与成矿密切相关.

trans.tran_cn: 古苏格兰人(的), 苏格兰人（的）
trans.tran_en: a native or inhabitant of Scotland
